easyinstall (3.0-1) stable; urgency=medium

  * Initial Debian package release
  * Enterprise Stack v3.0 with auto-healing and monitoring
  * Theme/Plugin editor enabled by default
  * XML-RPC management commands
  * Multi-site panel support
  * CDN and remote storage integration

 -- Sugando Drai <sugandodrai@easyinstall.local>  Mon, 23 Feb 2026 10:00:00 +0000
